name: The Flute
desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
skill_desc: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.
